Public Class Stack Implements ICloneable, ICollection
public ref class Stack : ICloneable, System::Collections::ICollection
type Stack = class interface ICollection interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表物件的簡單後進先出 (LIFO) 非泛型集合。

span.span: Represents a simple last-in-first-out (LIFO) non-generic collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們不建議您改用`Stack`開發新的類別。We don't recommend that you use the `Stack` class for new development. 相反地，我們建議您先使用一般類別。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 不應使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)GitHub 上。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 如果堆疊中的容量少於是 o （1） 的作業。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 是 o （1） 的作業。 is an O(1) operation. 接受`null`做為有效的值，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立及新增值以，以及如何顯示它的值。The following example shows how to create and add values to a and how to display its values. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 將元素複製到它們會讀取的相同順序的。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the . 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`col`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論它們是參考型別或實值型別，但是它不會複製參考所參考的物件集合的元素複製集合的淺層複本。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新的集合中的參考會指向相同原始集合中的參考所指向的物件。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 相反地，項目複製集合的深層複本，並直接或間接參考的元素，所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫方法。This method determines equality by calling the method. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會測試是否相等藉由傳遞`obj`引數集合中的個別物件的方法。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method tests for equality by passing the `obj` argument to the method of individual objects in the collection. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，使用傳遞個別的項目集合中要進行這項判斷方法的`obj`引數。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using passing the individual items in the collection to the method of the `obj` argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是項目數目，可以儲存。The capacity is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量永遠是大於或等於。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過容量加入元素時，會自動將舊的項目複製並加入新項目之前，重新配置內部陣列增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

span.span: Returns an for the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果存取 已同步處理 (執行緒安全) 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將物件插入 的頂端。

span.span: Inserts an object at the top of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量的容量會加上自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. `null` 可以推入至做為預留位置，如有需要。`null` can be pushed onto the as a placeholder, if needed. 它所佔用的位置堆疊中，就會被視為任何物件。It occupies a slot in the stack and is treated like any object. 如果堆疊中的容量少於是 o （1） 的作業。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入項目來，移除項目，從，或檢視之項目的頂端。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the top of the . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.Peek Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.Peek Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.Peek Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.Peek Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.Peek Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.Peek Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Stack Synchronized(class System.Collections.Stack stack) cil managed

span.span: The to synchronize.

summary.span: 傳回 同步處理的 (安全執行緒) 包裝函式。

span.span: Returns a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for the .

returns.span: 在 周圍的同步包裝函式。

span.span: A synchronized wrapper around the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過此包裝函式。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: ，可用於同步處理 的存取。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的同步處理的版本，使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 不過，在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

Public Overridable Function ToArray () As Object()
abstract member ToArray : unit -> obj[] override this.ToArray : unit -> obj[]

span.span: Copies the to a new array.

returns.span: 新陣列，包含 之元素的複本。

span.span: A new array containing copies of the elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元素複製到陣列中後進先出 (LIFO) 順序，將連續的呼叫所傳回的項目順序類似。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將複製到一維陣列。The following example shows how to copy a into a one-dimensional array. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
